companions.content:
import android.os.Bundle
import android.view.View
import android.widget.Button
import android.widget.EditText
import android.widget.ImageView
import android.widget.Toast
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import com.example.niutao.R
import com.example.niutao.model.Menu
import com.example.niutao.utils.ImageUtils
import com.example.niutao.utils.ToastUtils

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    private lateinit var menuEditText: EditText
    private lateinit var priceEditText: EditText
    private lateinit var imageView: ImageView
    private lateinit var uploadButton: Button
    private lateinit var saveButton: Button
    private lateinit var likeButton: Button
    private lateinit var commentButton: Button

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        menuEditText = findViewById(R.id.menu_edit_text)
        priceEditText = findViewById(R.id.price_edit_text)
        imageView = findViewById(R.id.image_view)
        uploadButton = findViewById(R.id.upload_button)
        saveButton = findViewById(R.id.save_button)
        likeButton = findViewById(R.id.like_button)
        commentButton = findViewById(R.id.comment_button)

        uploadButton.setOnClickListener {
            ImageUtils.uploadImage(this, imageView)
        }

        saveButton.setOnClickListener {
            val menu = Menu(menuEditText.text.toString(), priceEditText.text.toString(), imageView.drawable)
            ToastUtils.showToast(this, "菜品保存成功")
        }

        likeButton.setOnClickListener {
            ToastUtils.showToast(this, "点赞成功")
        }

        commentButton.setOnClickListener {
            ToastUtils.showToast(this, "评论成功")
        }
    }
}
data class Menu(val name: String, val price: String, val image: Int)

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/menu_edit_text"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="菜品名称" />
    <EditText
        android:id="@+id/price_edit_text"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:hint="价格" />
    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/image_view"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content" />
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/upload_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="上传图片" />
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/save_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="保存" />
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/like_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="点赞" />
    <Button
        android:id="@+id/comment_button"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="评论" />
</LinearLayout>
